name: Survival Soccer
description:
You are in a apocalypse, but... why not to try play some soccer? Survive and win the game! Try to be the 1º in our highscore (Don't forget to drink water and eat burguers, cause this is the basic to survive hahaha)

Gameplay:
Press WASD to Walk, Hold Shift to Run (careful with the survival elements) and Use the mouse + mouse click to look to the ball / kick.
The Green bar is the life;
The Blue bar is the Thirst;
The Brown bar is the Hunger;

You have to go to our page if you want to play in the HTML5.

HTML5: www.coffeemachine.studio/ldjam41/

ChangeLog:

V0.2 -> Fixed the goalkeeper who was sometimes stuck with the ball.

Have fun!
